participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, enjoys intellectual discussions and has a light-hearted approach to life.
participant_1.background: i only eat kosher. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i'm a stunt double as my second job.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and creative, loves animals and writing, with a laid-back attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i dance on the weekends.

books year, funny you :)
